scripts.update-controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name UserDatabaseController -async -api -outDir Controllers -dc webapi.MyDbContext.MyUserContext -m webapi.MyDbContext.User -f
scripts.update-view: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator view ImageRipperView List -outDir Views -dc ImageRipper.PhotoContext -m ImageRipper.Collage -f
